post.author: thomas lee

comment.author: 이성기
comment.content: 기왕할것 영어로 준비해 주세요. 신민용씨도 오게

post.content:
My Suggestion is so far we have been concentrated in technical skils only. However we have not discussed on soft skills in order to acquire job and how to survive/advance from current job.
We are busy trying to get tecnical knowledge. If we think of our daily work activities, technical portions are a lot less than soft skills such as meeting participation, preparing proposal, tech support, documentation, e-mail writing, phone conversation.
Let's have the seminars about soft skills. We could acquire different methods and background. Also different experiences.
List of Soft Skills ---------------------- - Meeting Participation - Leadership - New proposal Generation - Presentation - etc
Let's me know or set the date using chating fuction on COMM1
post.title: Seminar Suggestion
